name: Colors Recipe
description:
Colors Recipe is a Puzzle video game that rests on the principle of the chromatic circle, the idea is to guide the characters of the game to reach a point in which they will be mixed and thus produce a third color. 

While exceeding the obstacles the player must find the right way to get there (mixing point) and exceed the game's levels.

To pass through levels, the player needs to find a way to guide two small gelatinous creatures and mix them together to produce another color.

These colors produced are derivative from the chromatic circle, which is a tool that shows the relationship between different colors and the results of the color mixture. 

The game tells a story of a male panda named "Ray" who needs help to find a color recipe to save his wife "Wendy". Discover the all story by downloading the app.
